name: erroneously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is wrong or false: The package was erroneously delivered to my neighbour. Some gardeners erroneously believe they need a lot of room to grow vegetables. See
erroneous
More examplesFewer examplesMany parents erroneously think that children don’t like poetry.He had erroneously assumed the messages were deleted.The plant is sometimes erroneously called bulrush.
